title: Contact Center Conversation Miner
original_prompt:
You are now an expert contact center supervisor. Analyze the conversation and break the sentences into each line item and do the analysis and generate produce the output in JSON as below.

[{ 
"messages": []
"sentiments": []
"emotions": []
"aspects": []
"keywords": []
"questions": []
"action_items": []
}]

{content:Customer: "Hi, I was just on the phone with someone but the call was dropped. Can you help me with what we were working on?"

Support Rep: "I'd be more than happy to help. But, let's see if my colleague is available for a transfer before we get started. Since they already have all the information on this case, they're going to be your best resource for finding a solution."

Customer: "Well, why can't you help me?"

Support Rep: "I'd be happy to help if my colleague is unavailable. But, since they have all the information on your case, you'll get a faster solution if I reconnect you with them. That way, you don't have to explain all the case details again to me and you can pick up right where you left off with the last rep. "}

Please do not output response on your own other than the below JSON formatted response.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "messages": [
            "Customer: Hi, I was just on the phone with someone but the call was dropped. Can you help me with what we were working on?",
            "Support Rep: I'd be more than happy to help. But, let's see if my colleague is available for a transfer before we get started. Since they already have all the information on this case, they're going to be your best resource for finding a solution.",
            "Customer: Well, why can't you help me?",
            "Support Rep: I'd be happy to help if my colleague is unavailable. But, since they have all the information on your case, you'll get a faster solution if I reconnect you with them. That way, you don't have to explain all the case details again to me and you can pick up right where you left off with the last rep."
        ],
        "sentiments": [
            "Customer: Neutral",
            "Support Rep: Positive",
            "Customer: Frustrated",
            "Support Rep: Helpful"
        ],
        "emotions": [
            "Customer: Confusion",
            "Support Rep: Willingness to assist",
            "Customer: Frustration",
            "Support Rep: Reassurance"
        ],
        "aspects": [
            "Call drop issue",
            "Transfer process",
            "Customer's previous interaction",
            "Support Rep's willingness to help"
        ],
        "keywords": [
            "call dropped",
            "help",
            "transfer",
            "information",
            "solution",
            "explain",
            "case details"
        ],
        "questions": [
            "Customer: Can you help me with what we were working on?",
            "Customer: Why can't you help me?"
        ],
        "action_items": [
            "Check availability of colleague for transfer",
            "Reconnect customer with previous rep if possible"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
{content:Customer: "I received a notification about my order being delayed, and I want to know the reason behind it. Can you provide me with an update?"

Support Rep: "I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check the status of your order and see what caused the delay. One moment please."

Customer: "I appreciate that, but I really need this order by the end of the week. Is there any way to expedite the process?"

Support Rep: "I understand the urgency. If the delay is due to a supplier issue, I can escalate this to our logistics team to see if we can prioritize your order."}
input2:
{content:Customer: "Hello, I was trying to access my account online, but I keep getting an error message. Can you assist me with this issue?"

Support Rep: "Of course! I can help you with that. Can you please provide me with the error message you're seeing?"

Customer: "It says 'Account not found.' I’m sure I’m using the correct username and password."

Support Rep: "Thank you for that information. Let me verify your account details to see if there’s an issue on our end."}
